node.title: William Tyrrell search to last 'weeks and weeks' as 15 tonnes of soil sent to lab for testing
node.description: NSW Police Commissioner Mick Fuller says officers will leaveÂ "nothing unturned" in the search for missing boy William Tyrrell's remains, but admits it could take weeks to find any answers.
node.content:
["NSW's top police officer\u00a0says it could take \"weeks and weeks\" to sift through the\u00a015 tonnes of soil removed as part of the search for William Tyrrell's remains on the Mid-North Coast.", "Police officers and specialists in the coastal town of Kendall\u00a0this morning pushed on with their search for William \u2014 who vanished in 2014 \u2014 despite poor weather conditions.", "Speaking in Canberra, NSW Police Commissioner Mick Fuller said the search for the young boy's\u00a0remains would continue \"until investigators believe the job is done\".", "He said 30 specialist officers remained on scene and was hopeful authorities could bring the seven-year case to a close.", "\"We have taken 15 tonnes of soil and other pieces of evidence or potential evidence back for forensic investigation,\" Commissioner Fuller said.", "\"[It's] particularly challenging weather conditions at the moment but that will continue until investigators believe that the job is done.\"", "", "
William Tyrrell was three-years-old when he disappeared from his foster-grandmother's front yard in 2014.(Supplied)
", "Officers, he said, had found several objects which would be \"foreign to normal bushlands\" which were being sent back for DNA testing in Sydney.", "Items which have been found included pieces of fabric.", "\"If you think about 15 tonnes of soil being moved into a clandestine lab, there could be weeks and weeks of searching through that before we have any answers,\" Commissioner Fuller said.", "Police have only searched less than 20 per cent of the three sites around where William disappeared in 2014, in the front yard of his foster-grandmother's home in Kendall.", "Late on Saturday afternoon, the main search area was lashed by a short but violent thunderstorm.", "Officers spent Sunday morning cleaning up a site about a kilometre from the home of William's foster-grandmother after it was hit by strong winds and heavy rain.", "Police\u00a0focused on clearing dense bush and debris across the square-kilometre site while the majority of digging and sifting has been put on hold.", "", "
Heavy rain has hampered the police search for William Tyrrell's remains.\u00a0(ABC News: Bruce Mackenzie)
", "Some of the gazebos police had put up to protect the site were blown over, others collapsed under the weight of rain.", "The damage has now been cleaned up and the search has resumed but the focus will be on clearing undergrowth rather than trying to sift through sodden soil.", "More rain is predicted over the next few days with the Bureau of Meteorology issuing an alert for potential minor flooding in the area.", "Specialists from the Australian Federal Police (AFP) have been assisting with the operation, providing devices which can penetrate the ground with X-rays.", "Commissioner Fuller said police would leave \"nothing unturned\".", "\"We want to be certain that the search is being done as thorough as possible. We could be there for a number of weeks,\" he said.", "", "
Police are pushing ahead with their search for William Tyrrell's\u00a0remains, despite\u00a0heavy rain\u00a0soaking the site.\u00a0(ABC News: Bruce Mackenzie)
"]
